content: * **Heavy Attack: Mountain Splitter - Dash forward with full force. Fully charge to dash further**. This is a slow, but heavy charged dash which can pin enemies and also get you out of danger if needed. It lacks a lot of control, however.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Azure_Dust.md', within the main section titled 'Azure Dust'.
The content is as follows:
* **Heavy Attack: Mountain Splitter - Dash forward with full force. Fully charge to dash further**. This is a slow, but heavy charged dash which can pin enemies and also get you out of danger if needed. It lacks a lot of control, however.
